public abstract class JavasciException
extends java.lang.Exception

This class provides a general exception class for Javasci v2 API.

See Also:

          This class provides a exception class when an non-existing variable is accessed.
static class JavasciException.UnknownTypeException
          This class provides a exception class when a type is unknown This should be very very rare.
static class JavasciException.UnsupportedTypeException
          This class provides a exception class when an unsupported type is used
